idea:
Xpert CCTV Solution installation :

Many businesses are effected by crime each year plus hundreds of thousands of burglaries, and this costs a staggering, with a staggering 10% of business lost as a consequence of crime.


CCTV is a very powerful tool in the fight against crime. Not only does CCTV provide a fantastic visual deterrent – footage can be used to provide evidence against anti-social behaviour, theft, vandalism and burglary – saving you thousands in the long run.

CCTV helps to deter thieves

View remote locations, including multiple locations at once

Safely monitor premises from a control room

Provide CCTV evidence to Police to secure a prosecution
name: Xpert Cctv Solution

idea: Yashika Journals publication is a publication company providing print publication in journals relating to engineering management and education. Yashika journal publication is a company that mainly deals with publication of research articles in printed books as well as online journals . Yashika journal publication will help researchers and authors to publish their research based on the scope and quality confirmed by national and international reviewers, which are paid to improvise the quality of research given by authors. Yashika journal publication mainly deals with book publications in India while also providing online publication services for foreign researchers.
name: Yashika Journal Publication Private Limited

idea: To achieve true democratization in investment and insurance space by harnessing talent through individuals passionate about bringing change in status quo. To carry out in India/ abroad, the business, to develop, provide, undertake, design, import, export, distribute, maintain, operate, establish, install, host, create, facilitate, supply, digital platform license or otherwise deal in technology services for parties operating in the Banking, Non-Banking, Financial Services, Investment Advisory, Financial Product distribution and insurance sectors.
name: NAIK TECHXP PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
"bioSimilia" is a start-up organization initiated by Dr Rajesh Shah during the COVID-19 lock-down period for bringing the benefits of newer method of managing infections and other diseases, developing new Nano medicinal (homeopathic) products for which he has researching for over two decades.


COVID-19 pandemic has no prevention or cure as on 5th November 2020. The world is eying on some magical cure such as ‘vaccine’ by early 2021. As per the experts the vaccines may have limitations in terms of limited efficacy, adverse effects, logistic challenges (cold-chain storage), cost-inefficiency, etc.


The need for alternative Immunity building and preventive solutions beyond Vaccines has been identified and getting explored for COVID-19. COVID-19 related New Drug Discovery is the first candidate in the list of many.


A range of similar new medicinal products are being researched by Dr Shah, which will be explored in the coming years.

Development, innovation and exploration of new medicinal substances using nanoparticles by homeopathic methods.


Website
name: BIOSIMILIA PRIVATE LIMITED
